artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two belt buckles on the left; in the center two women shown from the waist up in elaborate hats; on the right a woman in a white and blue gown with white ruffles on the sleeves, white gloves, and a hat with three pink flowers and green foliage
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Trentième Cahier, 10 Septembre 1788
